com.chattriggers.ctjs.engine

Class IRegister.DefaultImpls

  • com.chattriggers.ctjs.engine.IRegister.DefaultImpls
  • Enclosing interface:
    IRegister

    public static class IRegister.DefaultImpls

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultImpls

        public DefaultImpls()

    • Method Detail

      • register

        @NotNull
public static OnTrigger register(IRegister $this,
                                          @NotNull
                                          java.lang.String triggerType,
                                          @NotNull
                                          java.lang.Object method)

        Helper method register a trigger.

        Called by taking the original name of the method, i.e. registerChat, removing the word register, and comparing it case-insensitively with the methods below.

        Parameters:
        $this - the type of trigger
        triggerType - The name of the method or the actual method to callback when the event is fired
        method - The name of the method or the actual method to callback when the event is fired
        Returns:
        The trigger for additional modification

      • registerChat

        @NotNull
public static OnChatTrigger registerChat(IRegister $this,
                                                  @NotNull
                                                  java.lang.Object method)

        Registers a new trigger that runs before a chat message is received.

        Passes through multiple arguments:

        • Any number of chat criteria variables

        • The chat event, which can be cancelled

        Available modifications:

        • OnRenderTrigger.triggerIfCanceled Sets if triggered if event is already cancelled

        • OnChatTrigger.setChatCriteria Sets the chat criteria

        • OnChatTrigger.setParameter Sets the chat parameter

        • OnTrigger.setPriority Sets the priority

        Parameters:
        $this - The method to call when the event is fired
        method - The method to call when the event is fired
        Returns:
        The trigger for additional modification
        See Also:
        OnRenderTrigger.triggerIfCanceled, OnChatTrigger.setChatCriteria, OnChatTrigger.setParameter, OnTrigger.setPriority

      • registerClicked

        @NotNull
public static OnRegularTrigger registerClicked(IRegister $this,
                                                        @NotNull
                                                        java.lang.Object method)

        Registers a new trigger that runs before a mouse button is being pressed or released.

        Passes through four arguments:

        • The mouse x position

        • The mouse y position

        • The mouse button

        • The mouse button state (true if button is pressed, false otherwise)

        Available modifications:

        • OnTrigger.setPriority Sets the priority

        Parameters:
        $this - The method to call when the event is fired
        method - The method to call when the event is fired
        Returns:
        The trigger for additional modification
        See Also:
        OnTrigger.setPriority

      • registerDragged

        @NotNull
public static OnRegularTrigger registerDragged(IRegister $this,
                                                        @NotNull
                                                        java.lang.Object method)

        Registers a new trigger that runs while a mouse button is being held down.

        Passes through five arguments:

        • The mouse delta x position (relative to last frame)

        • The mouse delta y position (relative to last frame)

        • The mouse x position

        • The mouse y position

        • The mouse button

        Available modifications:

        • OnTrigger.setPriority Sets the priority

        Parameters:
        $this - The method to call when the event is fired
        method - The method to call when the event is fired
        Returns:
        The trigger for additional modification
        See Also:
        OnTrigger.setPriority

      • registerSoundPlay

        @NotNull
public static OnSoundPlayTrigger registerSoundPlay(IRegister $this,
                                                            @NotNull
                                                            java.lang.Object method)

        Registers a new trigger that runs before a sound is played.

        Passes through six arguments:

        • The sound event's position

        • The sound event's name

        • The sound event's volume

        • The sound event's pitch

        • The sound event's category's name

        • The sound event, which can be cancelled

        Available modifications:

        • OnSoundPlayTrigger.setCriteria Sets the sound name criteria

        • OnTrigger.setPriority Sets the priority

        Parameters:
        $this - The method to call when the event is fired
        method - The method to call when the event is fired
        Returns:
        The trigger for additional modification
        See Also:
        OnSoundPlayTrigger.setCriteria, OnTrigger.setPriority

      • registerStep

        @NotNull
public static OnStepTrigger registerStep(IRegister $this,
                                                  @NotNull
                                                  java.lang.Object method)

        Registers a new trigger that runs in predictable intervals. (60 per second by default)

        Passes through one argument:

        • Steps elapsed

        Available modifications:

        • OnStepTrigger.setFps Sets the fps, ie. how many times this trigger will fire per second

        • OnStepTrigger.setDelay Sets the delay in seconds, ie how many seconds it take to fire. Overrides OnStepTrigger.setFps.

        • OnTrigger.setPriority Sets the priority

        Parameters:
        $this - The method to call when the event is fired
        method - The method to call when the event is fired
        Returns:
        The trigger for additional modification
        See Also:
        OnStepTrigger.setFps, OnStepTrigger.setDelay, OnStepTrigger.setFps, OnTrigger.setPriority

      • registerPlayerJoined

        @NotNull
public static OnRegularTrigger registerPlayerJoined(IRegister $this,
                                                             @NotNull
                                                             java.lang.Object method)

        Registers a new trigger that runs when a player joins the world.

        Maximum is one per tick. Any extras will queue and run in later ticks. This trigger is asynchronous.

        Passes through one argument:

        • The class PlayerMP object

        Available modifications:

        • OnTrigger.setPriority Sets the priority

        Parameters:
        $this - The method to call when the event is fired
        method - The method to call when the event is fired
        Returns:
        The trigger for additional modification
        See Also:
        class PlayerMP, OnTrigger.setPriority

      • registerItemTooltip

        @NotNull
public static OnRegularTrigger registerItemTooltip(IRegister $this,
                                                            @NotNull
                                                            java.lang.Object method)

        Registers a new trigger that runs when a tooltip is being rendered. This allows for the user to modify what text is in the tooltip, and even the ability to cancel rendering completely.

        Passes through three arguments:

        • The list of lore to modify.

        • The class Item that this lore is attached to.

        • The cancellable event.

        Available modifications:

        • OnTrigger.setPriority Sets the priority

        Parameters:
        $this - The method to call when the event is fired
        method - The method to call when the event is fired
        Returns:
        The trigger for additional modification
        See Also:
        class Item, OnTrigger.setPriority

      • registerPlayerInteract

        @NotNull
public static OnRegularTrigger registerPlayerInteract(IRegister $this,
                                                               @NotNull
                                                               java.lang.Object method)

        Registers a new trigger that runs before the player interacts.

        In 1.8.9, the following events will activate this trigger:

        • Left clicking a block

        • Right clicking a block

        • Right clicking the air

        In 1.12.2, the following events will activate this trigger:

        • Left clicking a block

        • Left clicking air

        • Right clicking an entity

        • Right clicking a block

        • Right clicking an item

        • Right clicking air

        Passes through three arguments:

        • The enum ClientListener.PlayerInteractAction

        • The position of the target as a Vector3d

        • The event, which can be cancelled

        Available modifications:

        • OnTrigger.setPriority Sets the priority

        Parameters:
        $this - The method to call when the event is fired
        method - The method to call when the event is fired
        Returns:
        The trigger for additional modification
        See Also:
        enum ClientListener.PlayerInteractAction, OnTrigger.setPriority

        Parameters:
        $this - The method to call when the event is fired
        method - The method to call when the event is fired
        Returns:
        The trigger for additional modification

      • registerEntityDeath

      • registerHitBlock

        @NotNull
public static OnRegularTrigger registerHitBlock(IRegister $this,
                                                         @NotNull
                                                         java.lang.Object method)

        Registers a new trigger that runs whenever a block is left clicked

        Note: this is not continuously called while the block is being broken, only once when first left clicked.

        Passes through three arguments:

        • The class Block being hit

        • The specific class BlockFace being hit

        • The event, which can be cancelled

        Available modifications:

        • OnTrigger.setPriority Sets the priority

        Parameters:
        $this - The method to call when the event is fired
        method - The method to call when the event is fired
        Returns:
        The trigger for additional modification
        See Also:
        class Block, class BlockFace, OnTrigger.setPriority
